page.title: 20Education 30 years ago
page.content: cont. The toilets wer outside in 2 blocks - one for boys and one for girls. They had no flush and had to be emptied every so often b;y the "sewerage men". The playground must have been one of the best in the country - the whole of the common. It was great fun in the winter, almost everyone brought sledges to school to use at playtime. Those who stayed for school lunches had to walk in indian file down to the Village Hall where lunches were brought in containers by the dinner van. B Thorne
